content: a tiny pullover style knit ornament perfect for adding a cozy touch to your holiday season hang it on your tree use it as a small gift or tie it onto a present as a charming gift tag it requires only a small amount of yarn so it s a great way to use up leftovers and enjoy a quick fun project this mini pullover is worked from the top down in the round increasing raglan sts place the sleeve stitches on hold cast on stitches for the underarms and work the body in the round to the hem return the held sleeve stitches to the needles and knit the sleeves in the round **gauge after washing and blocking ** stockinette stitch 32 sts x 40 row = 10x10cm / 4x4 on 3 mm us½ needle gauge is not critical for this project use needles appropriate for your chosen yarn **needles ** 3 mm us 2½ 5 double-pointed needles dpns if using the magic loop method a long circular needle can be used instead **suggested yarn ** fingering yarn sample uses british fine by puppy 25 g = 116 m / 127 yds approx 24 m / 27 yds **notions ** extra scrap yarn or stitch holders tapestry needle
